name: Trek to forest & View Rhododendron flowers – 2 day
description:
Rhododendron are a group of beautiful flowering plants, with many different colors. We just
naturally distributed in the high mountains, with cool weather all year round, because these are species of subtropical regions or high mountain temperate. In Vietnam, Rhododendron usually in Sa Pa, Tam Dao, Bach, etc ... Which Sapa, where the high mountains of Hoang Lien National Park, considered to be the center of many best Rhododendron with over 30 different species.
